description.narrative: The grant was intended to support CAFO to create women-led agricultural cooperatives in 10 rural communities in the Mande rural commune. The grant supported CAFO to facilitate interactions between the cooperatives for organizational development. CAFO established a community-based legal network in the district, and used rural radio as a means to communicate information about democratic processes and rights advocacy. CAFO also nurtured partnerships with three New Field key partners – COFERSA, DIRFEL, MUNYU – for collaborative learning about what works for rural women to earn income from their farming, and increase their understanding of the advantages of good citizenry.

participating-org.narrative: La Coordination Des Associations Et Ong Féminines Du Mali
